thread.title: Watch: Mark Whipple leads UMass football team (complete with gray uniforms) onto the field
thread.title_full: Watch: Mark Whipple leads UMass football team (complete with gray uniforms) onto the field

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Watch: Mark Whipple leads UMass football team (complete with gray uniforms) onto the field
text:
Comments 
Watch as the Massachusetts football team takes the field at McGuirk Alumni Stadium for the first time in the 2015 season. 
The Minutemen looked a little different this time around, busting out the gray uniforms for the first time. 
Coach Mark Whipple led the team onto the field on a cold, overcast day in Amherst. Check back after the game for updates and analysis for Dan Malone as the Minutemen take on Florida International.
